content:
@Juan Pablo Tosca Villanueva and I noticed that PR #10191 doesn't have any images pushed to GHCR. Other recent pull requests like #10188 have images that were pushed.

Not sure what's going on. We looked briefly at the new auto-usage docs from #9776 and container_app_push.yml.
After fixing merge conflicts images were generated. Probably that was the cause? :shrug:
Can we mark this solved @Juan Pablo Tosca Villanueva?

Hi Oliver :wave: Happy New Year! I think we can, I am not 100% sure what is the solution but that PR had some merge conflicts, after they were fixed an image was pushed. I am not sure if solving the conflict was the solution or if it only triggered something at that point in time and worked as expected :thinking:
Merge conflict resolution sounds like a likely cause! Let's mark it as resolved, we can always go back.
Oliver Bertuch has marked this topic as resolved.
